properties.name: label
properties.description: Label at the top of the Chips component

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Setup placeholder inside area related to new chip

properties.name: removable
properties.description: Allow remove chips items when setup as true

properties.name: validators
properties.description: Array of validator Objects. When multiple validators fail, only one error is displayed, determined by their order in the array. Each Object should have three fields:

subProperty.name: message
subProperty.description: Error message that shown when validation fails

subProperty.name: validator
subProperty.description: Function that takes input value as an argument and returns Boolean

properties.name: alt
properties.description: When the props passed the alternative styles with functionality will be applied, the chip will be saved only if it passes validation check and etc

properties.name: paddingRight
properties.description: Apply padding right for 'ds-chips-container' when component has a slot right

properties.name: showCorrectCheck
properties.description: Allowed to display default green background for valid state of Chips

properties.name: showValidations
properties.description: Responsible for displaying validation of Chips

properties.name: name
properties.description: With this property Chips component will be listening to validation with current value for e.g. 'validateTest'

events.name: validation
events.description: Emitted when the chips items will be changed

events.name: validate
events.description: Listening event 'validate' for running validation even if chips items wasn't touched

events.name: update:chips
events.description: Emitted when the chips are increased or decreased
